Text:
This does not belong in the game section.

And if we wanted the audio from the game, we could have just searched the game files...

MYOB, you aren't a mod.

At least he's uploading and helping others.

Although I already have this, thanks Marco, I appreciate the effort.

They package the files weird. 
If you want to find a way to unpack them all and dig through them, then be my guest. Until then, I'll use this.
